name: agdelte
description: Reactive UI Framework with Dependent Types in Agda

scripts.build:all: npm run build:counter && npm run build:timer && npm run build:todo && npm run build:keyboard && npm run build:http && npm run build:task && npm run build:websocket && npm run build:router && npm run build:composition && npm run build:transitions && npm run build:combinators && npm run build:optic-dynamic && npm run build:worker && npm run build:parallel && npm run build:session-form && npm run build:stress-test && npm run build:remote-agent && npm run build:server && npm run build:multi-agent && npm run build:shared-demo && npm run build:inspector-demo
scripts.css:all: npm run css:demo && npm run css:full-demo && npm run css:anim-data
scripts.typecheck:all: agda -i src src/Agdelte/Reactive/Node.agda && agda -i src src/Agdelte/Theory/Poly.agda && agda -i src -i examples examples/Counter.agda && agda -i src -i examples examples/Timer.agda && agda -i src -i examples examples/Todo.agda
scripts.build:server: agda --compile --compile-dir=_build --ghc-flag=-ihs --ghc-flag="-odir _build" --ghc-flag="-hidir _build" --ghc-flag="-package network" --ghc-flag="-package text" --ghc-flag="-package bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package crypton" --ghc-flag="-package base64-bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package memory" --ghc-flag="-package stm" --ghc-flag="-package containers" server/HttpAgent.agda
scripts.build:multi-agent: agda --compile --compile-dir=_build --ghc-flag=-ihs --ghc-flag="-odir _build" --ghc-flag="-hidir _build" --ghc-flag="-package network" --ghc-flag="-package text" --ghc-flag="-package bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package crypton" --ghc-flag="-package base64-bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package stm" --ghc-flag="-package memory" --ghc-flag="-package containers" server/MultiAgent.agda
scripts.build:shared-demo: agda --compile --compile-dir=_build --ghc-flag=-ihs --ghc-flag="-odir _build" --ghc-flag="-hidir _build" --ghc-flag="-package network" --ghc-flag="-package text" --ghc-flag="-package bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package crypton" --ghc-flag="-package base64-bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package memory" --ghc-flag="-package stm" --ghc-flag="-package containers" server/SharedAgentDemo.agda
scripts.build:inspector-demo: agda --compile --compile-dir=_build --ghc-flag=-ihs --ghc-flag="-odir _build" --ghc-flag="-hidir _build" --ghc-flag="-package network" --ghc-flag="-package text" --ghc-flag="-package bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package crypton" --ghc-flag="-package base64-bytestring" --ghc-flag="-package memory" --ghc-flag="-package stm" --ghc-flag="-package containers" server/InspectorDemo.agda
